sbp_ave = #{sbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dbp_ave = #{dbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update jfhealth_new set HRV = #{HRV,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sbp_ave = #{sbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dbp_ave = #{dbpAve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Heartrate = #{heartrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Bloodoxygen = #{bloodoxygen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, microcirculation = #{microcirculation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, respirationrate = #{respirationrate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imei = #{imei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'year'

select.if: SELECT TRUNCATE(avg(sleeping),0) as sleeping,TRUNCATE(avg(step_when),0) as step_when, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM equipment_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y') = #{timedata} AND user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d');

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'month'

select.if: SELECT TRUNCATE(avg(sleeping),0) as sleeping,TRUNCATE(avg(step_when),0) as step_when, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM equipment_data WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m') = #{timedata} AND user_id=#{userId} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d')

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'day'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'week'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'year'

select.if: SELECT TRUNCATE(avg(HRV),0) as HRV,TRUNCATE(avg(sbp_ave),0) as sbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(dbp_ave),0) as dbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(Heartrate),0) as Heartrate, TRUNCATE(avg(Bloodoxygen),0) as Bloodoxygen,TRUNCATE(avg(microcirculation),0) as microcirculation,TRUNCATE(avg(respirationrate),0) as respirationrate, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM jfhealth_new WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y') = #{timedata} AND phone=#{phone} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d');

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'month'

select.if: SELECT TRUNCATE(avg(HRV),0) as HRV,TRUNCATE(avg(sbp_ave),0) as sbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(dbp_ave),0) as dbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(Heartrate),0) as Heartrate, TRUNCATE(avg(Bloodoxygen),0) as Bloodoxygen,TRUNCATE(avg(microcirculation),0) as microcirculation,TRUNCATE(avg(respirationrate),0) as respirationrate, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM jfhealth_new WHERE DATE_FORMAT(createtime, '%Y-%m') = #{timedata} AND phone=#{phone} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d');

if.test: service != null and service != '' and service == 'day'
service != null and service != '' and service == 'week'

select.if: SELECT TRUNCATE(avg(HRV),0) as HRV,TRUNCATE(avg(sbp_ave),0) as sbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(dbp_ave),0) as dbp_ave,TRUNCATE(avg(Heartrate),0) as Heartrate, TRUNCATE(avg(Bloodoxygen),0) as Bloodoxygen,TRUNCATE(avg(microcirculation),0) as microcirculation,TRUNCATE(avg(respirationrate),0) as respirationrate, date_format(createtime, '%Y-%m-%d') as date FROM jfhealth_new WHERE YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d'))=YEARWEEK(NOW()) AND phone=#{phone} GROUP BY date_format(createtime, '%Y%m%d');

if.test: keyWord != null and keyWord != '' and keyWord == 'year'

select.if: select * from jfhealth_new where year(createtime)= #{timedata} and phone =#{phone} ORDER BY sbp_ave DESC LIMIT 1 ;

if.test: keyWord != null and keyWord != '' and keyWord == 'month'

select.if: select * from jfhealth_new where month(createtime)= #{timedata} and phone =#{phone} and year(createtime)= #{year} ORDER BY sbp_ave DESC LIMIT 1 ;

if.test: keyWord != null and keyWord != '' and keyWord == 'day'

select.if:
select * from jfhealth_new where day(createtime)= #{timedata} and phone =#{phone} and year(createtime)= #{year} and
month(createtime)= #{month} ORDER BY sbp_ave DESC LIMIT 1;

if.test: keyWord != null and keyWord != '' and keyWord == 'week'

select.if: select * from jfhealth_new where YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d'))=YEARWEEK(NOW()) and phone =#{phone} ORDER BY sbp_ave DESC LIMIT 1;

if.test: keyWord != null and keyWord != '' and keyWord == 'year'

select.if: select * from jfhealth_new where year(createtime)= #{timedata} and phone =#{phone} ORDER BY dbp_ave LIMIT 1 ;

if.test: keyWord != null and keyWord != '' and keyWord == 'month'

select.if: select * from jfhealth_new where month(createtime)= #{timedata} and phone =#{phone} and year(createtime)= #{year} ORDER BY dbp_ave LIMIT 1 ;

if.test: keyWord != null and keyWord != '' and keyWord == 'day'

select.if:
select * from jfhealth_new where day(createtime)= #{timedata} and phone =#{phone} and year(createtime)= #{year} and
month(createtime)= #{month} ORDER BY dbp_ave LIMIT 1 ;

if.test: keyWord != null and keyWord != '' and keyWord == 'week'

select.if: select * from jfhealth_new where YEARWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(createtime,'%Y-%m-%d'))=YEARWEEK(NOW()) and phone =#{phone} ORDER BY dbp_ave LIMIT 1 ;

mapper.select:
select count(*) from jfhealth_new
where CONCAT(imei) LIKE concat(concat('%',#{_parameter}),'%')
SELECT * FROM jfhealth_new where imei=#{imei} ORDER BY createtime desc LIMIT 0, 1
SELECT *FROM jfhealth_new WHERE phone =#{alias} ORDER BY createtime LIMIT 0,1
